original: de rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that extensively,🔽

original: de ltar ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to extensively teach that, he says, “It is not like that,” and so on.

original: shes bya skra shad la sogs pa med par gal te skra shad la sogs pa'i blo yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: shes bya skra shad la sogs pa med par gal te skra shad la sogs pa'i blo yod par 'gyur na /
translated: If the consciousness of floaters and so on existed without the object of apprehension, floaters and so on,

original: skra shad de'i yul dang mig gi rjes su 'brel pa'i rab rib med pa la'ang zhes bya ba ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad kyi yul la zhugs pa'i rab rib dang bral @178a * //🔽ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: skra shad de'i yul dang mig gi rjes su 'brel pa'i rab rib med pa la'ang zhes bya ba ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad kyi yul la zhugs pa'i rab rib dang bral @178a * // ba la yang ngo //
translated: then even for one without the eye disease of blurred vision, who is not connected to the object of the floaters,🔽there would be the consciousness of floaters.

original: skra shad blor gyur na zhes bya ba ni skra shad med na skra shad kyi blo skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: skra shad blor gyur na zhes bya ba ni skra shad med na skra shad kyi blo skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If there were a consciousness of floaters, then even for one without floaters, a consciousness of floaters would arise.

original: de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rab rib can ma yin pa la rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad kyi yul la skra shad kyi blo skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rab rib can ma yin pa la rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad kyi yul la skra shad kyi blo skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not like that. For one without eye disease, a consciousness of floaters does not arise in the object of the floaters seen by one with eye disease.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis so //
translated: Therefore, for the reason just explained,

original: de yod min zhes bya ba ni yul med kyang blo yod pa yin no zhes pa de ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de yod min zhes bya ba ni yul med kyang blo yod pa yin no zhes pa de ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “it does not exist” means that the cognition exists without an object.

original: de nyid 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says:

original: gal te rab rib can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gal te rab rib can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “If someone with diseased vision sees falling hair, etc.”

original: de dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rab rib can bzhin du'o ;
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rab rib can bzhin du'o ;
translated: “Like that” means like someone with diseased vision.

original: / yul med par mtshungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab rib can dang rab rib can med pa dag las skra shad med par 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / yul med par mtshungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab rib can dang rab rib can med pa dag las skra shad med par 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because they are similar in being without an object” means that the falling hair is similar in being nonexistent for those with diseased vision and those without diseased vision.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jug pa'o //🔽de la gzhan dag na re gang gi phyir rab rib can la snang la rab rib med pa la mi snang ba de nyid kyi phyir yul med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jug pa'o // de la gzhan dag na re gang gi phyir rab rib can la snang la rab rib med pa la mi snang ba de nyid kyi phyir yul med pa yin te /
translated: “Therefore” and so on introduce the verse.

original: mthun par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthun par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: In response to this, some say that because it appears to someone with diseased vision and does not appear to someone without diseased vision, therefore it does not exist as an object.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: It does not appear in the same way.🔽This is not reasonable.

original: yul thun mong ba yin du zin kyang dngos po gang la mthong ba'i mthun rkyen gang yod pa de mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: yul thun mong ba yin du zin kyang dngos po gang la mthong ba'i mthun rkyen gang yod pa de mthong ba yin la /
translated: Even if the object is common, it is seen when the conditions for seeing it are present.

original: de med na mi mthong ba yin pas rab rib med pa la yul mthong ba'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen rab rib med pa'i phyir de mi mthong ba la 'gal ba ni ci zhig yod ces 'ga' zhig smra bar gyur na de la lan ji ltar 'debs /
analyzed: de med na mi mthong ba yin pas rab rib med pa la yul mthong ba'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen rab rib med pa'i phyir de mi mthong ba la 'gal ba ni ci zhig yod ces 'ga' zhig smra bar gyur na de la lan ji ltar 'debs /
translated: If they are not present, it is not seen. So if someone says, “When the eye is free of myodesopsia, the condition for seeing the object is absent, so why is it not contradictory that it is not seen?” how would you respond?

original: des na lan de yang mi rigs pa'o //
analyzed: des na lan de yang mi rigs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, that response is also unreasonable.

original: yang sems tsam pas yul med pa'i rnam par shes pa la yod pa nyid du ston pa ni 'dir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yang sems tsam pas yul med pa'i rnam par shes pa la yod pa nyid du ston pa ni 'dir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Again, the Cittamātra assertion that consciousness exists without objects is addressed in the lines beginning “If, in the absence of objects, consciousness can arise . . .”

original: de ltar 'gyur ba zhig go zhes bya ba ni yul med na blo med pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba zhig go zhes bya ba ni yul med na blo med pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: “That would be so” means that if there are no objects, there would be no cognition.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags sngar bzhag pa smin pa dang ma smin pa dang ma smin pa dag ces bya ba ni sngar skra shad la sogs pa'i shes pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bag chags gzhag pa de smin pa las skra shad kyi rnam
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags sngar bzhag pa smin pa dang ma smin pa dang ma smin pa dag ces bya ba ni sngar skra shad la sogs pa'i shes pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bag chags gzhag pa de smin pa las skra shad kyi rnam
translated: The ripening of the latent propensities of consciousness, whether they have already ripened, are ripening or have not yet ripened is as follows.🔽🔽The latent propensities of consciousness that were previously deposited in the foundation consciousness by the consciousness of floaters and so on ripen and the appearance of floaters arises.🔽

original: par shes pa skye ba dang / ma smin pa las mi skye ba yin no //
analyzed: par shes pa skye ba dang / ma smin pa las mi skye ba yin no //
translated: The ripening and non-ripening of the latent impressions of consciousness” means that the latent impressions of the consciousness of the storehouse consciousness are placed by the previous consciousness of floating hair, etc. The consciousness of floating hair arises from the ripening of that, and it does not arise from the non-ripening.

original: gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang la bag chags smin pa yod pa ma yin pa la'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang la bag chags smin pa yod pa ma yin pa la'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not in another” means it is not in that in which the ripening of the latent impressions does not exist.

original: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the response to that, he says,

original: 'di yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “This is also not tenable,” and so on.

original: 'di yang zhes bya bzhi bag @178b chags smin pa dang ma smin pa dag rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mi skye ba'i rgyur 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya bzhi bag @178b chags smin pa dang ma smin pa dag rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mi skye ba'i rgyur 'dod pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to the assertion that the ripening and non-ripening of the latent impressions are the cause of the arising and non-arising of consciousness.

original: mi rigs pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rigs pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that this is not tenable, he says,

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “Because,” and so on.

original: gang gi phyir mthong ba dag pa rab rib med pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la blo mi skyed pa'i nus pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mthong ba dag pa rab rib med pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la blo mi skyed pa'i nus pa ste /
translated: Because of that, the pure seeing that is the foundation consciousness free of🔽the eye disease of ignorance does not generate the potential for the arising of🔽the mind.

original: bag chags yongs su smin pa med pa de'i phyir rab rib med pa de la skra shad kyi blo mi skye ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bag chags yongs su smin pa med pa de'i phyir rab rib med pa de la skra shad kyi blo mi skye ba yin gyi /
translated: Because the potential, i.e., the vāsanā, for the arising of the cognition of hair-nets in the pure seeing, the foundation consciousness free from cataracts, has not matured, therefore, the cognition of hair-nets does not arise in one free from cataracts.🔽It is not that the object of cognition does not exist.

original: shes bya med pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya med pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: This is the statement of the opponent’s position.

original: de la lan ni nus pa med pas 'di'i ni grub pa ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la nus pa ma grub pa'i phyir blo'i nus pa smin pa dang ma smin pas /
analyzed: de la lan ni nus pa med pas 'di'i ni grub pa ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la nus pa ma grub pa'i phyir blo'i nus pa smin pa dang ma smin pas /
translated: The response to that is: “Since there is no potential, this is not established.”

original: rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mi skye ba dag 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mi skye ba dag 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since the potential in the foundation consciousness is not established, the arising and non-arising of consciousness are not established by the maturation and non-maturation of the potential of the cognition. This is the meaning.

original: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says:

original: shes bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shes bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “The object of cognition,” etc.

original: de smin pa dang ma smin pa ngag la zhes bya ba ni nus pa smin pa dang ma smin pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de smin pa dang ma smin pa ngag la zhes bya ba ni nus pa smin pa dang ma smin pa dag la'o //
translated: “In the matured and unmatured voice” means in the matured and unmatured capacities.

original: de'i phyir 'di mi 'grub po zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i phyir smin pa dang ma smin pa rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dag tu mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mi 'grub po zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i phyir smin pa dang ma smin pa rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dag tu mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, this is not established, means that because there is no capacity, the production and non-production of consciousness in the matured and unmatured are not established.

original: nus pa med pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nus pa med pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that very absence of capacity, he says:

original: skyes la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: skyes la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “In the produced, etc.”

original: skyes pa ste da ltar ba'i rnam par shes pa 'bras bur gyur pa la nus pa srid pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ste da ltar ba'i rnam par shes pa 'bras bur gyur pa la nus pa srid pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: In the produced, i.e., the present consciousness, which is the effect, there is no possibility of capacity.

original: ma skyes ngo bo la yang nus yod min //
analyzed: ma skyes ngo bo la yang nus yod min //
translated: Nor is there capacity in the unproduced entity.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i ngo bo 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa dag kyang nus pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i ngo bo 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa dag kyang nus pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The past and future consciousnesses, which are unproduced entities, also do not have capacity.

original: ci ltar nus pa med pa de ltar ni slob dpon nyid kyis 'grel pa las bshad par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: ci ltar nus pa med pa de ltar ni slob dpon nyid kyis 'grel pa las bshad par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Just how there is no capacity, the Master himself will explain in the commentary.

original: / de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: / de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain that,

original: 'dir nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Here, the power,” etc.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Here means the fundamental consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa da ltar ba'i 'grel pa can zhig gam zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las gang rnam par shes pa skyes pa dang da ltar ba de dang 'brel pa can zhig yin nam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa da ltar ba'i 'grel pa can zhig gam zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las gang rnam par shes pa skyes pa dang da ltar ba de dang 'brel pa can zhig yin nam zhes pa'o //
translated: “The present consciousness is related to it” means that the present consciousness that arises from the fundamental consciousness is related to it.

original: ma skyes ngo bo la'ang zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i 'brel pa can zhig tu 'gyur grang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma skyes ngo bo la'ang zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i 'brel pa can zhig tu 'gyur grang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Nor is it in the nature of the non-arisen” means that it would be related to past and future consciousness.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the past and future are non-arisen.

original: de la skyes pa la nus pa mi srid pa bstan pa la phyogs gnyis te /
analyzed: de la skyes pa la nus pa mi srid pa bstan pa la phyogs gnyis te /
translated: Here, the impossibility of power in the arisen is shown in two parts.

original: @179a * // skyes pa la 'brel pa can gyi nus pa srid pa ma yin pa dang / da ltar bar skyes pa de nus pa la ltos pa srid pa ma yin pa'o //🔽de la phyogs dang po 'gog pa ni /
analyzed: @179a * // skyes pa la 'brel pa can gyi nus pa srid pa ma yin pa dang / da ltar bar skyes pa de nus pa la ltos pa srid pa ma yin pa'o // de la phyogs dang po 'gog pa ni /
translated: It is not possible for a potential that is related to the arisen to exist, and it is not possible for that which has arisen in the present to depend on a potential.🔽Refuting the first possibility, he states:

original: de la re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In that case, first of all,

original: gang gi tshe nus pa'i zhes bya ba drug pa yin la de'i tshe ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa can gyi nus pa can srid pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nus pa'i zhes bya ba drug pa yin la de'i tshe ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa can gyi nus pa can srid pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: If the meaning of “the potential of consciousness” is taken to be the sixth case, then at that time it is not possible for a potential that is related to consciousness to exist.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bor gyur pa ni zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bor gyur pa ni zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i shes pa'o //
translated: That which has become the nature of the effect of consciousness refers to the present consciousness.

original: rgyu nyid du yang yod do zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i rgyu nyid du yod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid du yang yod do zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i rgyu nyid du yod pa'o //
translated: It also exists as the cause refers to its existing as the cause of the potential.

original: gzhan yang gal te rnam par shes pa de rgyu nyid du 'dod na de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te rnam par shes pa de rgyu nyid du 'dod na de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if you assert that consciousness is the cause, then at that time the effect would be without a cause.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa can yin pa'i phyir nus pa phyis 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa can yin pa'i phyir nus pa phyis 'byung ba yin la /
translated: Because it is related to consciousness, the potency arises later.

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu ni nus pa med par skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu ni nus pa med par skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: But because the effect, which has the nature of consciousness, arises without potency, it would be causeless.

original: myu gu skye ba na yang sa bon mi 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: myu gu skye ba na yang sa bon mi 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And when the sprout arises, the seed would not perish.

original: ci ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu med pa nus su zin kyang skye ba de bzhin du myu gu yang sa bon med bar skye bas sa bon mi 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu med pa nus su zin kyang skye ba de bzhin du myu gu yang sa bon med bar skye bas sa bon mi 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the effect, which has the nature of consciousness, arises even though the potency does not exist, so the sprout would arise without the seed, and the seed would not perish.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: “Therefore” and so on

original: drug pa'i phyogs mi 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i mjug bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: drug pa'i phyogs mi 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i mjug bsdu ba yin no //
translated: concludes that the position of the opponent is untenable.

original: da ni da ltar bar skyes pa de nus pa la ltos pa 'dod pa 'gog pa ni /
analyzed: da ni da ltar bar skyes pa de nus pa la ltos pa 'dod pa 'gog pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to refute the assertion that what has arisen in the present depends on potency, he says,

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “When,” and so on.

original: nus pa las zhes bya ba lnga pa yin pa zhes bya ba ni gal te lnga pa'i tshig yin na de'i tshe ni don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: nus pa las zhes bya ba lnga pa yin pa zhes bya ba ni gal te lnga pa'i tshig yin na de'i tshe ni don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: “From potency” is the fifth case. If it is a word of the fifth case, then this is the meaning:

original: nus pa las skye pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: nus pa las skye pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
translated: “It arises from potency.”

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: And that is not reasonable. To show that, he says,

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: “At that time,” and so on.

original: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /
translated: Why is it not reasonable?

original: yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, “Because it exists.”

original: yod pa la ni nus pas dgos pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa la ni nus pas dgos pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For that which exists, potency is of no use whatsoever.

original: sngar bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sngar bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “This was explained earlier.”

original: skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: “That which has arisen does not arise again.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: And so on.

original: phyogs gnyis pa yang mi rigs pa'i mjug bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa yang mi rigs pa'i mjug bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: To show the summary of the second position, which is also unreasonable, he says,

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: “Thus,” and so on.

original: ma skyes pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That which has not arisen also has two types:

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: past and future.

original: de la @179b ma 'ongs pa la ltos nas nus pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la @179b ma 'ongs pa la ltos nas nus pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute the potential in dependence on the future, he says,

original: ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “The future does not exist because it has not yet arisen.”

original: ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin can te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin can te /
translated: It has the nature of not having arisen.

original: ma 'ongs pa la nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa la nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The future does not exist because it has not yet arisen.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Why is that?🔽He says, “Because it is not tenable that a difference exists without a basis.”

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin te /
translated: “ Difference” refers to the future consciousness.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa des nus pa rnam par shes pa dang 'brel bar byed pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa de med na khyad par de med pas khyad par can yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa des nus pa rnam par shes pa dang 'brel bar byed pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa de med na khyad par de med pas khyad par can yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because that consciousness would make the potential related to the consciousness, if the future consciousness did not exist, that difference would not exist, and therefore the basis of that difference would not exist.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa med na ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa'i nus pa ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa med na ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa'i nus pa ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
translated: If the future consciousness did not exist, how could the potential related to the future consciousness exist?

original: gal te rnam par shes pa med kyang rnam par shes pa'i nus pa khas len na med pa tsam du mtshungs pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la yang nus pa yod pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir khas mi len /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa med kyang rnam par shes pa'i nus pa khas len na med pa tsam du mtshungs pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la yang nus pa yod pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir khas mi len /
translated: If you accept that there is a potential for consciousness even though there is no consciousness, then why don’t you accept that there is a potential for the son of a barren woman, since it is the same in being nonexistent?

original: don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this point,🔽it is said:

original: mo gsham bu yang de ni yod par thal //
analyzed: mo gsham bu yang de ni yod par thal //
translated: The son of a barren woman would also exist.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽de 'grel bas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / de 'grel bas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The commentary explains:

original: khyad par med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the absence of any distinction,

original: rnam par shes pa med par ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med par ro //
translated: in the absence of consciousness,🔽there is no distinction,

original: khyad par du bya ba yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni nus pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni nus pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: there is no potential.

original: khyad par ci ltar med ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ci ltar med ce na /
translated: How is there no distinction?🔽It is said:

original: gang ma skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang ma skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That which is unborn, etc.

original: dgag pa dang / sgrub pa'i ngo bos zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes dgag pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: dgag pa dang / sgrub pa'i ngo bos zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes dgag pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: “By the nature of negation and affirmation” means by the nature of the affirmation “consciousness” and the negation “not consciousness.”

original: gang gi tshe de ltar yin pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa bstan par mi nus pas na'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar yin pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa bstan par mi nus pas na'o //
translated: “When this is so” means when it is impossible to demonstrate consciousness.

original: gang gi nus pa khyad par du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nus pa la khyad par du byed pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi nus pa khyad par du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nus pa la khyad par du byed pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: “The capacity would be distinguished” means that because there is no consciousness, the capacity would not be distinguished.

original: 'di ni 'di'i nus pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i nus pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “This is its capacity” means that this is the capacity of consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe da ltar khyad par yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe da ltar khyad par yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “When there is no present distinction” means when there is no distinction having the characteristic of consciousness.

original: khyad par du ma smras pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par ma grub pas so //🔽'dis cung zad kyang bstan par ma 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gang las gang skye @180a * //
analyzed: khyad par du ma smras pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par ma grub pas so // 'dis cung zad kyang bstan par ma 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gang las gang skye @180a * //
translated: In particular, it is not stated is because the distinction that has the characteristic of consciousness is not established.

original: ba yin zhes bya ba'i khyad par cung zad kyang mi rtogs pas so //
analyzed: ba yin zhes bya ba'i khyad par cung zad kyang mi rtogs pas so //
translated: By this, it is not shown that anything is produced is because no distinction whatsoever is understood, such as “from what is what produced?”

original: yang gal te ma skyes pa la nus pa 'dod na zhes bya ba ni khyad par med du zin kyang nus pa 'dod na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yang gal te ma skyes pa la nus pa 'dod na zhes bya ba ni khyad par med du zin kyang nus pa 'dod na zhes pa'o //
translated: Moreover, if you assert that what is not produced has the capacity, is because, even if there is no distinction, you assert the capacity.

original: mo gsham gyi bu la yang 'dod par bya dgos te zhes bya ba ni med par khyad par med pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la yang nus pa yod par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu la yang 'dod par bya dgos te zhes bya ba ni med par khyad par med pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la yang nus pa yod par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: You must assert that even the son of a barren woman exists is because, since there is no distinction in non-existence, why wouldn’t even the son of a barren woman have the capacity?

original: de'i phyir ma skyes pa la nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma skyes pa la nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, what is not produced does not have the capacity is the conclusion.

original: gzhan dag gis khyad par bsgrub pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis khyad par bsgrub pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Others establish the distinction, beginning with “Why is that?”

original: skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa de snying la bsams nas gzhan phyogs snga ma 'god pa'o //🔽'di las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa'i nus pa 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'di 'byung ba yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa de snying la bsams nas gzhan phyogs snga ma 'god pa'o // 'di las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa'i nus pa 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'di 'byung ba yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The opponent’s position is presented in terms of the consciousness that will arise.🔽“This will arise from that” means that in dependence on the consciousness that will arise, the capacity of consciousness is said to be the future consciousness that will arise.

original: de ltar khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po 'grub par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba de snying la bzhag pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: de ltar khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po 'grub par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba de snying la bzhag pa la ltos nas so //
translated: “In this way, the relationship of the qualifier and the qualified is established” means that in dependence on the consciousness that will arise, the capacity of consciousness is said to be the future consciousness that will arise.

original: skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate an example that depends on the consciousness that will arise,

original: ji skad du brten nas 'bras chan tshos shig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji skad du brten nas 'bras chan tshos shig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Cook the rice,” and so on.

original: de la 'bras chan 'tshod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de la 'bras chan 'tshod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: In that case, it is not the rice that is cooked,

original: 'on kyang 'bras 'tshod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'bras 'tshod pa yin la /
translated: but rather the rice is cooked.

original: ci ltar 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras chan gyi ming 'bras la btags pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
analyzed: ci ltar 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras chan gyi ming 'bras la btags pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
translated: Just as the name of the rice that will arise here is imputed to the rice, so it is here as well.🔽“Hang the cloth on this thread” — here, how could the cloth that is already produced be hung?

original: snal ma 'di la ras yug thogs shig ces bya ba ni 'dir btags zin pa'i ras yug ji ltar 'thag /'on kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ltos nas ras yug thogs shig ces brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: snal ma 'di la ras yug thogs shig ces bya ba ni 'dir btags zin pa'i ras yug ji ltar 'thag /'on kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ltos nas ras yug thogs shig ces brjod pa yin la /
translated: However, in dependence on what will arise, it is said, “Hang the cloth.”

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po la grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po la grub pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, in dependence on the consciousness that will arise, the thing that is the basis of the distinction and that which is distinguished is established.

original: 'jig rten gyi dpe bstan nas bstan bcos kyi dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi dpe bstan nas bstan bcos kyi dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having taught the example of the world, in order to teach the example of the treatise, he says,

original: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “Also, in the treatise . . .”

original: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba ni mdzod kyi rtsa ba las so //
analyzed: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba ni mdzod kyi rtsa ba las so //
translated: “Also, in the treatise” refers to the root text of the Treasury of Abhidharma.

original: mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mngal du 'jug pa med kyi /
analyzed: mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mngal du 'jug pa med kyi /
translated: The Entry into the Womb and so forth are with regard to the universal monarch, the self-conqueror, and the perfect buddha, who do not enter the womb.

original: 'on kyang 'byung bar @180b 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos nas 'khor los sgyur ba dang rang 'byung gnyis zhes gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'byung bar @180b 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos nas 'khor los sgyur ba dang rang 'byung gnyis zhes gsungs pa yin la /
translated: However, in dependence upon the name of the one who will come forth, it is said that there are two: the universal monarch and the self-originated one.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang yin pas nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang yin pas nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Likewise, here also, there is no fault, since it is the same.

original: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the reply to that,🔽he says,

original: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and that also, etc.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos nas brjod par 'dod pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos nas brjod par 'dod pa la yang ngo //
translated: That also is with regard to the name of the one who will come forth, and is also asserted to be expressed.

original: snying po med ces bya ba ni don gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po med ces bya ba ni don gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be without essence because it is empty of meaning.

original: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te dus gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can brjod par 'dod na ste /
analyzed: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te dus gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can brjod par 'dod na ste /
translated: if you assert that consciousness, which will arise at another time, has the nature of the relationship of differentiator and differentiated,

original: 'dis ni phyogs snga ma rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni phyogs snga ma rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: this is the statement of the opponent’s position.

original: de la lan ni /
analyzed: de la lan ni /
translated: The response to that is:

original: nus pa med par 'di yi 'byung 'gyur med //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /🔽skye ba'i nus pa med par ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa med par 'di yi 'byung 'gyur med // ces bya ba gsungs te / skye ba'i nus pa med par ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba nyid med pa'o //
translated: Without potential, it would not arise.

original: 'di'i don ni gal te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod na de'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po 'grub par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni gal te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod na de'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa la ltos nas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi gzhi'i dngos po 'grub par 'gyur ba las /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: If consciousness that will arise in the future exists, then in dependence on the consciousness that will arise, the relationship of differentiator and differentiated would be established.

original: da ltar ba'i nus pa med pa'i phyir de 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos na brjod pa ni 'thad pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i nus pa med pa'i phyir de 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming la ltos na brjod pa ni 'thad pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Because there is no present potentiality, there is no arising of it. Therefore, in dependence on the name of that which is to arise, the statement is not tenable.

original: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says,

original: res 'ga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: res 'ga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Sometimes, etc.

original: 'gyur na ni zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa 'byung na'o //
analyzed: 'gyur na ni zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa 'byung na'o //
translated: If it were to arise means if the future consciousness were to arise.

original: de 'byung bar 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de 'byung bar 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes brjod pa'o //
translated: It would arise from that means it would arise from that consciousness.

original: de ltar spyir bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar spyir bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught in general,

original: khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach in particular,

original: de'i phyir 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, Therefore, this, etc.

original: dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the similarity of the example to the probandum,

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, By this, etc.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma grub pas nus pa ma grub par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma grub pas nus pa ma grub par brjod pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to the nonestablished future consciousness, and thus the nonestablishment of the potential.

original: 'bras chan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir gyang nus pa grub na 'bras chan la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba grub pa yin pa las so //
analyzed: 'bras chan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir gyang nus pa grub na 'bras chan la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba grub pa yin pa las so //
translated: “Rice” and so on means that if the potential were established, then the arising of rice and so on would be established.

original: 'on kyang ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras chan la sogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i nus pa yang ma grub pas 'bras chan la sogs pa 'gyur @181a * //🔽bar 'gyur ba med pas bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras chan la sogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i nus pa yang ma grub pas 'bras chan la sogs pa 'gyur @181a * // bar 'gyur ba med pas bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: However, because future rice and so on are not established, the potential that depends on them is also not established. Therefore, because rice and so on do not arise, it is the same as what is to be proven.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa mi srid pas nus pa med pa nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa mi srid pas nus pa med pa nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Thus, since consciousness is impossible, the potential is shown to be nonexistent.

original: da ni nus pa yod du zin kyang gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa don dam par grub pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nus pa yod du zin kyang gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa don dam par grub pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that even if the potential exists, the consciousness that has the nature of the dependent nature is not ultimately established, he says:

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Moreover, if the potential exists,🔽The consciousness that is the effect of the potential🔽Would have to exist in the potential,🔽Just as rice exists in rice seeds.

original: phan tshun don la brten pa'i grub pa ni //
analyzed: phan tshun don la brten pa'i grub pa ni //
translated: The establishment of mutual dependence is:

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la ltos nas nus pa grub pa dang nus pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa grub bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la ltos nas nus pa grub pa dang nus pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa grub bo //
translated: This means that the capacity is established in dependence on consciousness, and consciousness is established in dependence on the capacity.

original: grub min nyid ces dam pa rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: grub min nyid ces dam pa rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: The wise have said that it is not established.

original: zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis phan tshun brten nas grub pa gang yin pa de ni grub pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis phan tshun brten nas grub pa gang yin pa de ni grub pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: This means that the wise have said that whatever is established in mutual dependence is not established.

original: gang gi phyir rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: Because whatever is a nature is not dependent on another,

original: bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not fabricated.

original: gang ltos pa can de ni rang bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: gang ltos pa can de ni rang bzhin ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is dependent is not a nature,

original: bcos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is fabricated.

original: des na phan tshun brten nas grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma grub pa ma yin no snyam pa'o //
analyzed: des na phan tshun brten nas grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma grub pa ma yin no snyam pa'o //
translated: Therefore, whatever is established in mutual dependence is not established.

original: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says:

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Consciousness, etc.

original: phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa yod na /🔽rnam par shes pa'i nus pa yod pa yin la /
analyzed: phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa yod na / rnam par shes pa'i nus pa yod pa yin la /
translated: “They would be mutually dependent” means that if consciousness exists, the potential of consciousness exists.

original: rnam par shes pa'i nus pa yod na rnam par shes pa 'byung ba gang yin pas phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i nus pa yod na rnam par shes pa 'byung ba gang yin pas phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And if the potential of consciousness exists, consciousness arises.🔽Thus, they would be mutually dependent.

original: de ltar gyur mod ce na zhes bya ba ni phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur du chug ces pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur mod ce na zhes bya ba ni phan tshun gyi don la brten par 'gyur du chug ces pa'o //
translated: “Even if that were so” means even if they were mutually dependent.

original: phan tshun gyi don la brten pa la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa la dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽dper na ring po dang thung ngu la sogs pa rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis ring po la sogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun gyi don la brten pa la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa la dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir / dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / dper na ring po dang thung ngu la sogs pa rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis ring po la sogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that mutual dependence does not exist inherently, he gives the example🔽“For example, long and short, etc.”

original: 'on kyang phan tshun ltos nas yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang phan tshun ltos nas yin la /
translated: Long, short, etc., do not exist inherently, but are mutually dependent.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, it is here as well.

original: des na rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med pas ltos pa can la rang bzhin yod pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir rang bzhin med pa kho nar khas blangs pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med pas ltos pa can la rang bzhin yod pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir rang bzhin med pa kho nar khas blangs pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the nature of things is not inherently existent, it is not established that that which is dependent has a nature.🔽

original: de ltar yin na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar yin na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that since the essence does not exist essentially, the existence of essence in that which is dependent does not exist, he says, “If that were so, etc.”

original: ji skad du bzhi brgya pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni cung @181b zad kyang mi byed pa ni rgyu nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji skad du bzhi brgya pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni cung @181b zad kyang mi byed pa ni rgyu nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: “As it says in the Catuhfi śataka, etc.” Since it is impossible for something that does not do anything to be a cause,

original: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rgyu ni 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skye ba dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu nyid thob pa'i phyir dngos po rnams ji ltar na rang gi 'bras bu'i 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rgyu ni 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skye ba dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu nyid thob pa'i phyir dngos po rnams ji ltar na rang gi 'bras bu'i 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur /
translated: there is no cause that exists essentially. Therefore, since the cause obtains the status of being a cause by virtue of its relation to the arising of the effect, how could things not be the effect of their own cause?

original: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur na ni myu gu la sogs pa bzhin du 'di la rtag pa nyid ga la yod /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur na ni myu gu la sogs pa bzhin du 'di la rtag pa nyid ga la yod /
translated: If they were the effect, how could they be permanent, like a sprout, etc.?

original: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rnam gzhag ma nges pas gnyis ka yang ngo bo nyid kyis ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i rnam gzhag ma nges pas gnyis ka yang ngo bo nyid kyis ma grub pa'o //
translated: Thus, since the presentation of cause and effect is not ascertained, neither is established by way of their own nature.

original: gal te 'bras bu'i rgyu yod na yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu'i rgyu yod na yod pa yin te /
translated: If the cause of an existent effect exists, it exists.

original: 'di ltar sa bon yod na myu gu skye'i myu gu yod pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sa bon yod na myu gu skye'i myu gu yod pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: In this way, if a seed exists, a sprout arises, but if a sprout exists, it does not.

original: des na 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not the effect.

original: de yang ma yin te /🔽gang gi phyir sa bon zhes bya ba'i dngos po myu gu skye ba'i sngon rol du yongs su rtog par byed na rgyur gyur pa zhig gam /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te / gang gi phyir sa bon zhes bya ba'i dngos po myu gu skye ba'i sngon rol du yongs su rtog par byed na rgyur gyur pa zhig gam /
translated: That also is not so.🔽If you imagine that a thing called a seed exists prior to the arising of a sprout, you do not go beyond two alternatives.🔽You cannot escape the two alternatives of whether it is a cause or

original: de rgyur ma gyur pa zhig ces yongs su brtag pa gnyis las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: de rgyur ma gyur pa zhig ces yongs su brtag pa gnyis las mi 'da' ste /
translated: it is not a cause.

original: phung po gsum pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phung po gsum pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: Because a third alternative is impossible.

original: de la re zhig rgyu ma yin par gyur pa me la sogs pa las bzhin du 'di skye ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de la re zhig rgyu ma yin par gyur pa me la sogs pa las bzhin du 'di skye ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: In that regard, first, it is not tenable that this arises from what is not a cause, like fire and so on.

original: rgyu nyid du ni 'bras bu skye ba'i sgo nas 'gyur ba yin la des na 'bras bu skye ba'i sngon rol du mi srid pas so //
analyzed: rgyu nyid du ni 'bras bu skye ba'i sgo nas 'gyur ba yin la des na 'bras bu skye ba'i sngon rol du mi srid pas so //
translated: It is a cause in the sense of giving rise to an effect, and therefore it is impossible for it to exist prior to the arising of the effect.

original: 'bras bu skye ba med par bya ba khas blangs nas 'ga' zhig rgyu nyid kyis mi thob na de'i tshe thams cad thams cad kyi rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba med par bya ba khas blangs nas 'ga' zhig rgyu nyid kyis mi thob na de'i tshe thams cad thams cad kyi rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba las /
translated: If, having accepted that the effect does not arise, one does not obtain anything through its being a cause, then it follows that everything would be the cause of everything.

original: de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: des na rgyu rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba las 'bras bu skye ba la ma ltos par ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni med do //
analyzed: des na rgyu rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba las 'bras bu skye ba la ma ltos par ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni med do //
translated: Therefore, it follows that the cause would be causeless, and the effect would not depend on arising. It would not exist by its own intrinsic reality.

original: des na rgyu thams cad ni 'bras bu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon gnas pa yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na rgyu thams cad ni 'bras bu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon gnas pa yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the error would arise that all causes would be effects.

original: bstan bcos las zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i shes rab las so //
analyzed: bstan bcos las zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i shes rab las so //
translated: From the Treatise means from Fundamental Wisdom.

original: der yang ltos nas grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: der yang ltos nas grub pa yin gyi /
translated: There it says that things are established in dependence,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: but not by their intrinsic reality.

original: gal te dngos po gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽de nyid la yang ltos nas ni //
analyzed: gal te dngos po gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / de nyid la yang ltos nas ni //
translated: If you say that the object exists in dependence on consciousness,🔽then consciousness would exist in dependence on the object.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa de nyid la ltos nas ni zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa de nyid la ltos nas ni zhes pa'o //
translated: “Then consciousness” refers to consciousness itself.

original: ltos bya gang yin zhes bya ba ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: ltos bya gang yin zhes bya ba ni nus pa'o //
translated: “What is dependent” refers to the object.

original: de nyid la yang ltos nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: de nyid la yang ltos nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la ltos nas so //
translated: “Then consciousness” refers to consciousness itself.🔽Now, since neither is established,

original: da ni gnyis ka ma grub pas zhes bya ba ni nus pa dang rnam par shes pa dag go //
analyzed: da ni gnyis ka ma grub pas zhes bya ba ni nus pa dang rnam par shes pa dag go //
translated: “neither” refers to the object and consciousness.

original: gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni nus pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa @182a * //🔽'grub par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni nus pa la ltos nas rnam par shes pa @182a * // 'grub par 'gyur ram /
translated: “In dependence on what would what be established?” refers to whether consciousness is established in dependence on the object,

original: 'on te rnam par shes pa la ltos nas nus pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //🔽dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'on te rnam par shes pa la ltos nas nus pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'o // dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa //
translated: or whether the object is established in dependence on consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa nus pa ltos nas 'grub pa de'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa nus pa ltos nas 'grub pa de'o //
translated: “Whatever object is established in dependence on what” refers to the object that has the characteristic of the entity of consciousness, which is established in dependence on the object.

original: de'i phyir de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, “thus” and so on concludes.

original: de ltar ma 'ongs pa la nus pa med par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ma 'ongs pa la nus pa med par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught that the future does not have the capacity,

original: da ni 'das pa la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'das pa la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach that the past also does not have the capacity,

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽gal te 'gags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos po 'gags pa'i nus pa ste bag chags yin la /
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / gal te 'gags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos po 'gags pa'i nus pa ste bag chags yin la /
translated: he says, “Now, if the past . . .” and so on.

original: de smin pa las te /🔽'bras bu skye ba yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par las gal te sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur na ni de'i gzhan gyi nus pa las te /
analyzed: de smin pa las te / 'bras bu skye ba yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par las gal te sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur na ni de'i gzhan gyi nus pa las te /
translated: If the capacity of a thing that has ceased . . . and so on. The capacity of a thing that has ceased is a latent predisposition.🔽If the consciousness of blue and so on arises from the ripening of that,🔽from the transformation of the effect, then the consciousness of blue would arise from the capacity of another,

original: sngon po'i shes pa gzhan gyi nus pa las sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba las ;
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa gzhan gyi nus pa las sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba las ;
translated: from the capacity of the consciousness of blue that is other.

original: de ltar yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ltar yang mi rigs te /
translated: But that also is not tenable.

original: thams cad las thams cad 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad las thams cad 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that everything would arise from everything.

original: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that, he says:

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: If, etc.

original: skyes nas 'gag bzhin pa'i rnam par shes pas zhes bya ba ni da ltar bas so //
analyzed: skyes nas 'gag bzhin pa'i rnam par shes pas zhes bya ba ni da ltar bas so //
translated: Consciousness that has arisen and is in the process of ceasing means present consciousness.

original: 'bras bu'i don du zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i don du zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of the effect means for the sake of the arising of another consciousness of blue.🔽The special potency that is deposited is the maturation of the potency of the ceased consciousness.

original: nus pa'i khyad par gang gzhag pa rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i nus pa smin pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye ba'i don du nus pa'i khyad par gang gzhag pa yongs su smin pa de las so ;
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par gang gzhag pa rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i nus pa smin pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye ba'i don du nus pa'i khyad par gang gzhag pa yongs su smin pa de las so ;
translated: From that means from the maturation of the special potency that is deposited for the sake of the arising of a subsequent consciousness.

original: / gzhan gyi nus pa de las zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi sngon po'i rnam par shes pa'i nus pa las so //
analyzed: / gzhan gyi nus pa de las zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi sngon po'i rnam par shes pa'i nus pa las so //
translated: Another potency arises from that means from the potency of the previous consciousness of blue.

original: gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sngon po'i rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sngon po'i rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: It will occur means the consciousness of blue that will occur will occur.

original: gal te sngon po shes pa gnyis ka yang 'dra ba'i phyir rgyu gcig pa yin pas gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung ba ci ltar 'gyur snyam du sems la bzhag nas ci'i phyir zhe na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te sngon po shes pa gnyis ka yang 'dra ba'i phyir rgyu gcig pa yin pas gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung ba ci ltar 'gyur snyam du sems la bzhag nas ci'i phyir zhe na zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you think that because both the blue and the cognition are similar, they are the same cause, and so how could another arise from the potential of another?

original: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the answer to that, he says,

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “Because the continuum of the potential is different,” and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir rgyun der rgyun can rnams tha dad par yod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyun der rgyun can rnams tha dad par yod do //
translated: Because the continuum of the potential is different,

original: de'i phyir nus pa gzhan @182b las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nus pa gzhan @182b las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: another arises from another potential.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽gal te 'dir rgyun rtogs par byed na rgyun de rgyun can las tha dad par rtog gam /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te / gal te 'dir rgyun rtogs par byed na rgyun de rgyun can las tha dad par rtog gam /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.🔽If you understand the continuum here, do you imagine that continuum to be different from the things that constitute the continuum?

original: tha mi dad par rtog / re zhig tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par rtog / re zhig tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Or do you imagine it to be non-different?

original: tha dad du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: First, it is not different because it does not appear as different.

original: tha mi dad pa yin na ni rgyun can kho na yin pas de rnams phan tshun tha dad pa yin na gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon de nyid so na gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin na ni rgyun can kho na yin pas de rnams phan tshun tha dad pa yin na gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon de nyid so na gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: The meaning is that.

original: // de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says,

original: ta nu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ta nu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “tanu” and so on.

original: ta nu ni rgyal po la'o zhes bya ba'i dbyings 'di la rkyen byin pa'i sgo nas brgyud pas na rgyun zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ta nu ni rgyal po la'o zhes bya ba'i dbyings 'di la rkyen byin pa'i sgo nas brgyud pas na rgyun zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de brjod pa yin no //
translated: The root “tanu” means “king.” The nature of a continuum is said to be that which is related by the condition of the causal process.

original: rgyun de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that continuum like?

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel par 'jug pa na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel par 'jug pa na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, “when cause and effect operate in a relationship.”

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du gang gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du gang gnas pa'o //
translated: It is that which abides in the nature of cause and effect.

original: 'di ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub pa rnams la rgyun gcig pa nyid bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub pa rnams la rgyun gcig pa nyid bkag pa yin no //
translated: This is a refutation of the sameness of continuum for those things that are not established as cause and effect, like form, sound, and so on.

original: bar med par rim par rnam par ma chad par gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bar med par rim par rnam par ma chad par gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Without interval, without interruption, without break,

original: bar med pa ni skad cig gzhan gyis bar ma chad pas so //
analyzed: bar med pa ni skad cig gzhan gyis bar ma chad pas so //
translated: Without interval means without being interrupted by another moment.

original: rim par ni cig car du ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rim par ni cig car du ma yin pas so //
translated: Without interruption means not simultaneously.

original: rnam par ma chad par gnas pa ni rgyun chad pa med pas so //
analyzed: rnam par ma chad par gnas pa ni rgyun chad pa med pas so //
translated: Without break means without cessation of the continuum.🔽But how can it be without interval, without interruption, without break?

original: 'o na ni rim par rnam par ma chad par gnas pa de yang ji ltar zhe na skye ba dang 'chi ba brgyud pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'o na ni rim par rnam par ma chad par gnas pa de yang ji ltar zhe na skye ba dang 'chi ba brgyud pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “through the continuity of birth and death.”

original: lus gcig dor nas lus gzhan lan pa'i brgyud pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: lus gcig dor nas lus gzhan lan pa'i brgyud pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Through the continuity of the process of discarding one body and taking up another.

original: 'du byed kyi skad cig dus gsum pa'i nye bar len pa can la bya ba zhes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de ni nye bar len pa can yin te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi skad cig dus gsum pa'i nye bar len pa can la bya ba zhes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de ni nye bar len pa can yin te /
translated: The past, future, and present moments of the formative forces are those which possess appropriation,

original: de la brten nas tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten nas tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because verbal usage is based upon them.

original: 'dis ni rgyun tha dad pa nyid yin pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyun tha dad pa nyid yin pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: This refutes the fact that they are separate continua.🔽Like the continuum of wind, there is a continuum of consciousness.

original: rlung gi rgyun ltar rgyun chags pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar cho bo'i snga ma dang phyi ma'i chu'i skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma rnams la chu klung gi rgyun zhes brjod pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: rlung gi rgyun ltar rgyun chags pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar cho bo'i snga ma dang phyi ma'i chu'i skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma rnams la chu klung gi rgyun zhes brjod pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as the former and latter moments of water in a river are described as the continuum of the river, so it is with the continuum of consciousness.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rgyun no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rgyun no //
translated: The continuum is referred to by the pronoun ‘that’.

original: rgyun gyi cha shas zhes bya ba ni rgyun la yod pa'i sngon po'i shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams so //🔽des na rgyun gyi cha shas te /
analyzed: rgyun gyi cha shas zhes bya ba ni rgyun la yod pa'i sngon po'i shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams so // des na rgyun gyi cha shas te /
translated: The parts of the continuum are the moments of consciousness of blue that exist in the continuum.

original: sngon po'i shes pa'i yan lag go //🔽rdzas @183a * //
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa'i yan lag go //🔽rdzas @183a * //
translated: Therefore, the parts of the continuum are the limbs of the consciousness of blue.🔽The substance of the consciousness of blue is the consciousness of blue.

original: kyi skad cig ces bya ba ni sngon po'i shes pa'i skad cig go //
analyzed: kyi skad cig ces bya ba ni sngon po'i shes pa'i skad cig go //
translated: “Moment” means the moment of the cognition of blue.

original: rgyun can zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni de rnams la rgyun yod pa yin pas so //
analyzed: rgyun can zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni de rnams la rgyun yod pa yin pas so //
translated: “They are called a continuum” means that they have a continuum.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni rdzas kyi skad cig ma rnams la'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni rdzas kyi skad cig ma rnams la'o //
translated: “Those” refers to the momentary substances.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni sems tsam pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni sems tsam pas so //
translated: “By another” refers to the Cittamātra.

original: des na gzhan nyid grub pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na gzhan nyid grub pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: “Therefore, difference is established.”

original: gal te rgyun can tha dad par yod du zin kyang rgyun ni gcig pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgyun can tha dad par yod du zin kyang rgyun ni gcig pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If the members of the continuum exist as different, the continuum is one.

original: brjod par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that.

original: de las tha dad du gyur pa'i rgyun yod pa ni ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin pas so //🔽ci 'dod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las tha dad du gyur pa'i rgyun yod pa ni ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin pas so // ci 'dod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it has been explained earlier that a continuum that is different from that does not exist.

original: 'dir skyon ma yin no snyam na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'dod pa kho na yin no snyam na'o //
analyzed: 'dir skyon ma yin no snyam na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'dod pa kho na yin no snyam na'o //
translated: “If you say that it is not a fault because it is what is desired…” means that you think that it is only the arising of another from the potential of another.

original: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the response to that, it says:

original: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is not like that, etc.

original: de ltar 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan skye bar 'dod na'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan skye bar 'dod na'o //
translated: If one asserts that, etc. means if one asserts that another is produced from the potency of another.

original: thams cad thams cad las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan skye bar 'gyur na thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan skye bar 'gyur na thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Everything would be produced from everything means if another were produced from the potency of another, everything would be produced from everything.

original: bshad zin pas zhes bya ba ni thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig gis so //
analyzed: bshad zin pas zhes bya ba ni thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig gis so //
translated: Because it has already been explained means because of the statement, Everything would be produced from everything.

original: de las gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: de las gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating another’s doubt, he says,

original: 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Here someone might say, etc.

original: gal te rgyun can tha dad pa yin yang de ltar yin na yang de dag gi rgyun gcig pa yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gal te rgyun can tha dad pa yin yang de ltar yin na yang de dag gi rgyun gcig pa yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Even though the members of a continuum are different, they are one continuum.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni rgyun can rnams la'o //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni rgyun can rnams la'o //
translated: In them means in the members of a continuum.

original: de'i phyir nyes pa med ce na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung ba med pas thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon med do zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir nyes pa med ce na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung ba med pas thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon med do zhes bya'o ;
translated: If you say there is no error because there is no arising from another apart from that, then there is no error in saying that everything arises from everything.

analyzed: / de 'grel pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir / gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
